examples.text: Atatürk, ülkenin ilk yıllarında sayısız fabrikalar kurdu.
examples.translation: Atatürk established numerous factories in the early years of the country.
On October 29 1923, Atatürk founded the Republic of Türkiye.
Don't forget to wind up your watch before bed.
I installed the new software on my laptop.

examples.text: Avcılar, ormanda keklik avlamak için tuzak kurdular.
examples.translation: Hunters set traps in the forest to hunt partridges.

etymology: From Ottoman Turkish قورمق (kurmak), from Proto-Turkic *kur- (“to erect (a building), to establish”).
